import React,{useState} from 'react' function FunctionalFormHandling() { const [name, setName]=useState({firstName:'', lastName:''}) use return (
setName({firstName:e.target.value})} required />
please fill this required field
you entered
setName({lastName:e.target.value})} required />
please fill this required field
you entered
{`${JSON.stringify(name)} => ${name.firstName} and ${name.lastName}`}
) } export default FunctionalFormHandling
